meanings.definition: A unit of sound absorption equivalent to one square foot of a perfectly absorbing surface.
meanings.sent1: The room had a high sabin rating, so it was very quiet.
meanings.sent2: The soundproofing material had a sabin value of 0.8.
meanings.sent3: The sabin was so effective that even a pin drop could be heard.
meanings.sent4: Her silence was like a sabin, absorbing all the noise around her.
meanings.sent5: The sabin measurement made the room as silent as a library.

meanings.definition: A person who is a member of the Sabin family.
meanings.sent1: Mr. Sabin is a proud member of the Sabin family.
meanings.sent2: The Sabins have a family reunion every summer.
meanings.sent3: The Sabins always bring the best desserts to family gatherings.
meanings.sent4: She was as loyal to her family as a Sabin.
meanings.sent5: Being a Sabin meant always having someone to rely on.
